price: (13) You [believers] are more fearful within their breasts than Allāh. That is because they are a people who do not understand.
arabic: لَأَنتُمۡ أَشَدُّ رَهۡبَةٗ فِي صُدُورِهِم مِّنَ ٱللَّهِۚ ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمۡ قَوۡمٞ لَّا يَفۡقَهُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: la-antum ashaddu rahbatan fī ṣudūrihim mina al-lahi dhālika bi-annahum qawmun lā yafqahūna
